sect1.title: Change Log
sect1.para: Please note that the change log only lists which editor was responsible for putting the changes into SVN; please read the page in Chapter 1 for details on who wrote what.

listitem.para: March 23rd, 2005 [randy]: Updated to Shadow-4.0.7; added security patch to Vim instructions.
March 22nd, 2005 [randy]: Added the installation of documentation to the Linux-PAM instructions.
March 18th, 2005 [randy]: Added a sed command to the Zip instructions to fix an installation problem, suggested by Matthew Burgess.
